description_carte: The Blazing Fury. A master of fire magic, capable of unleashing devastating infernos.
description_visuelle: A towering humanoid figure composed of living flames. He wields a fiery sword and has a fierce expression.

skills.name: Fireball
skills.description: Hurls a ball of fire at the enemy.

skills.name: Flame Slash
skills.description: Slashes with a fiery sword, dealing increased damage.

skills.name: Inferno
skills.description: Unleashes a massive wave of flames, burning all enemies.

skills.name: Blazing Aura
skills.description: Increases own ATK and VIT for a short duration

skills.name: Eternal Flames
skills.description: Sets the target ablaze, inflicting damage each turn. Also slightly buffs own DEF
